article.headline: Valparaiso 99, Centenary 73
article.story: VALPARAISO, Ind. (AP) -- Dan Oppland and Seth Colclasure each scored 23 points as Valparaiso defeated Centenary 99-73 Thursday night in a Mid-Continent Conference game. Centenary took a 7-1 lead early in the game after a jumper by Chris Watson, but the Crusaders then went on 29-8 run over the next 10 minutes. The Gents cut what had been a 15-point Valparaiso lead down to six points early in the second half only to see the Crusaders go on another big run -- 22-7 in about five minutes -- to take control of the game. The win snapped a four-game losing streak for Valparaiso (12-8, 5-5 Mid-Con), which outrebounded Centenary 43-24 and won the turnover battle 18-9 to gain a 34-4 advantage in points off turnovers. Watson led the Gents (4-17, 2-9) with 17 points, followed by Clarke Jackson with 12 and Eric Holmes with 10. Mohamed Kone added 15 points and 11 rebounds for Valparaiso.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
